page.title: 04POTTEN END-THE NURSERY I.
page.content:
LITTLE HEATH FARM NURSERY COVERS EIGHTY ACRES OF LAND. OUT OF ALL THIS LAND ONLY FOUR ACRES ARE TAKEN,UP BY THE ACTUAL NURSERY. TWO ACRES ARE USED FOR PLANTS AND TWO FOR THE HORSES AND OTHER LIVESTOCK WHICH IS KEPT. THE REST OF THE LAND IS LEASED OUT BY THE OWNER.
SEVEN PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED TO WORK AT THE NURSERY,FIVE PART TIME AND TWO FULL TIME,WITH THE NORMAL WORKING DAY BETWEEN 8.30 AM AND 6.00 PM.
FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY THE NURSERY HAS ABOUT TWENTY GROUPS OF VISITORS EACH DAY,BUT DURING THE WEEKEND IT HAS MANY MORE.
THE LAND WHICH THE NURSERY OWNS WAS ORIGINALLY USED FOR ANIMALS AND CROP FARMING.IT HAS BEEN RUNNING FROM 1975.
